"A CsPbBr3 Perovskite Quantum Dot/Graphene Oxide Composite for Photocatalytic CO2 Reduction."

Excitation wavelength: 369.6 nm
Emission wavelengths: None

1. Powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD), 2. Transmission electron microscopy (TEM), 3. Raman spectroscopy, 4. Energy-dispersive X-ray (EDX) mapping, 5. X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), 6.
